description: This is the schema definition for the Type property.  It represents the schema used for the resource and indicates not only the schema but the version of that schema and is of the format <schema>.<majorversion>.<minorversion>.<errataversion>.
specification: This object represents the type property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.  Copyright (c) 2013, Avocent & Hewlett-Packard.  All rights reserved.  The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Type*
